@thehill I’d recommend this video to those who may find reading stressful and to those it may concern. I hope it’s helpful and you know what actions to take. Please be safe out there

@PhillipsPOBrien This was probably the goal all along, threaten invasion of Ukraine so the West will breathe a sigh of relief when he only takes two small regions. 

Then rinse and repeat.

It seems now that within days the 8 years of 'hard work' by Putin will likely come to fruition.

Donetsk & Luhansk will go to join the Russian Federation, the Russian military then 'officially' move in & that will be that.

No invasion of Ukraine, as the area will be in 'Russia'.

When I tell people Russia don't see Ukraine as a nation and all this is not a out NATO but about dominance they bring conspiracy bullshit to say it's wrong meanwhile, now Putin was saying Ukraine is not a nation...what do you think he plan to do? 
Invasion of the whole country.
You should check "BREAKING: Putin to speak on possible Ukraine invasion" on https://t.co/B8rLkwB8KL
NATO chief: ‘Russia is preparing for an invasion of Ukraine’ | WATE 6 On Your Side https://t.co/njWhJTCpue

@rolandparis With Trump all this Ukraine business would've been long over. POTUS would've met in private with Putin in 2020. Putin would've made his demands and Trump would made a few angry statements in public. After invasion, USA would freeze a few bank accounts and threaten more. Easy.

@kaitlancollins I need Republicans to pull their heads out of their white supremacist asses and see that him attacking Ukraine is the opening salvo for a war with the US. His invasion of Ukraine is more a challenge to the US to do something to stop him. Trump weakened the Republicans.

@RadioFreeTom Mentioning Ukraine has no independent courts left is chef's kiss. I don't know if I respect the stones more for this or that he's popping in a case for invasion to save Ukraine's economy.
